mapper.select: select travelcourse_idx, travelcourse_contents, travelcourse_title, travelcourse_cnt, date_format(travelcourse_createdtime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as travelcourse_createdtime from travelcourse where travelcourse_deleted = 'N' order by travelcourse_idx desc
mapper.insert: insert into travelcourse (travelcourse_title, travelcourse_contents, travelcourse_createdtime, user_id) values ( #{travelcourseTitle}, #{travelcourseContents}, now(), 'admin' )
mapper.update: update travelcourse set travelcourse_title = #{travelcourseTitle}, travelcourse_contenets = #{travelcourseContents}, travelcourse_createdtime = now(), user_id = 'admin' where travelcourse_idx = #{travelcourseIdx}
mapper.delete: update travelcourse set travelcourse_deleted = "Y", user_id = 'admin' where travelcourse_idx = #{travelcourseIdx}
